Interface HttpResponse

All Superinterfaces:
DecoderResultProvider, HttpMessage, HttpObject
All Known Subinterfaces:
FullHttpResponse
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultFullHttpResponse, DefaultHttpResponse
public interface HttpResponse extends HttpMessage
An HTTP response.

Accessing Cookies

Unlike the Servlet API, Cookie support is provided separately via ServerCookieDecoder, ClientCookieDecoder, ServerCookieEncoder, and ClientCookieEncoder.

See Also:
  • HttpRequest
  • ServerCookieDecoder
  • ClientCookieDecoder
  • ServerCookieEncoder
  • ClientCookieEncoder
